Rosmontis:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
Rosmontis:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

Rosmontis:StrikeRos.NAME: Strike
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Her brothers handle the sword.
They strike with her order.
--Script Caster KK

Rosmontis:DefendRos.NAME: Defend
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Her brothers handle the sword.
They strike with her order.

Rosmontis:Skill3.NAME: with your wishes
Rosmontis:Skill3.DESCRIPTION: Being fully attack. *Double all attack cards cost and they will play 3 times. Moreover, attack cards have 50% to Stun target. Lost 3 Dexterity.
Rosmontis:Skill3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate.Being fully attack. *Double all attack cards cost and they will play 3 times. Moreover, attack cards have 50% to Stun target. Lost 3 Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: "I'm here..
for watching you die"
